review: This is the best thing for those of us too cheap to set up cable on multiple tvs, or too lazy to put the game console on to pull up the apps.  It can stay plugged in at all times so you can switch to chromecast whenever.  I must also mention that it is FANTASTIC for playing ambient music from your Google Playlist when you are getting ready to go out or having a party.  Chromecast, yes.
author: greengoddess02

review: The chromecast is definitely my favorite streaming device simply because it doesn't have much of a physical profile. I'm usually cramped for space near my TV's so the ability to just plug something into an HDMI slot and not have to make room for it near the TV is crucial for me.Usually works well with the Chromecast compatible apps on my phone and makes it a lot easier to navigate exactly what you want to get to. This will be a problem if you're buying for a less tech savy user, they will likely miss the inclusion of a basic remote that simplified input methods.
